1370: Pelegrim moved to Die Coninc straet.C.1 after marriage.
Got married to Breghlent at age 30 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Breghlent, at age 31.
1372: Had a son with Breghlent, Vesse, at age 32.
1373: Lost daughter Breghlent when Breghlent was 3 years old.
1375: Had a son with Breghlent, Eelbout, at age 35.
1376: Had a son with Breghlent, Ghisele, at age 36.
1379: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Rabburgis, at age 39.
Lost son Vesse when Vesse was 8 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Clementia, at age 41.
1382: Had a son with Breghlent, Albertus, at age 42.
1383: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Baua, at age 43.
1385: Lost his wife Breghlent while she was giving birth to Vastraid in 1385.
Became caretaker of Eelbout, Ghisele, Rabburgis, Clementia, Albertus, Baua, Vastraid at age 46.
1386: Lost son Vastraid when Vastraid was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
